Verhofstadt is right that Brexit was an EU failure. But it’s bonkers to think it happened because the EU wasn’t enough of a superstate. It was because the Common Market the UK joined, which didn’t much compromise its sovereignty (aside from on trade) became the EU, which did.

Farage literally says he “hates” the EU. And the European Parliament replies with how much it respects the U.K. with genuine emotion & a charmingly awkward auld lang syne. The reality of the EU the U.K. press never really let us see.
